content:
Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "green_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]

thought: The crafting path for torch is charcoal, stick, and then torch. I have the ingredients for crafting a stick, so I will start there. To craft a stick, I need to place two planks next to each other in the crafting grid. I have two different types of planks available, so I will choose one arbitrarily. I will start by moving the acacia_planks from slot 19 to slot 4.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 16 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "green_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I will move the birch_planks from slot 25 to slot 1, which is to the left of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "green_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]
thought: After crafting the stick, I will move the acacia_planks back to slot 19, since it was not used in the crafting process.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "green_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]
thought: I will move the sticks from the crafting grid to slot 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "green_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]
thought: To make a torch, I need to place charcoal on top of a stick in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the charcoal from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "green_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I need to place the stick below the charcoal. Therefore, I will move the stick from slot 12 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: torch
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 34, "index": 17}, {"type": "green_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the torches and move them into the inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
